question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. goat
B. person holding a camera
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The goat is in the foreground, occupying a large portion of the frame and appearing larger, while the person is in the distant background on a rocky hillside, making the depth relationship very obvious.
